YPy3hTg1SRBRcn2YkC6HQw.text: Hands down best crawfish/seafood boil in Vegas. I've been to them all: hot n juice and boiling crab. The food is consistent, fresh and full of flavor. Can't beat their happy hour. Fresh crawfish ftw!  You can't go wrong with ordering their combo if you have groups of people. You get a good amount of food and the price is always reasonable.  Great customer service!

EcfhFcs6YbIgkRKzQnUHeA.text: Apparently Crab/crawfish boils are super popular and 2 other ones were over an hour wait. Urban crawfish had no wait and a lot of open tables. Seeing the good reviews on yelp and no wait, my husband and myself were super excited!  The place wasn't super busy, but wasn't dead. There was about 7 tables total that were occupied when we got there. A party of 6 were seated right after us. The waitress was very nice and friendly but unfortunately was slow in getting drink orders as well as coming back to the table to get our order. However she was running around, but it was hard to understand as there were multiple other employees there and we weren't getting service. The table of 6 must have gotten tired of waiting because they left.  When our waitress came to take our order (again, she was friendly, just maybe the restaurant was poorly staffed) we ordered (i dont know what it is called) the appetizer that was basically street corn that was fried. When we got it, it was not good. I would not recommend or ever order these again. The ranch that was served with them were awful!  For our main course we ordered a shrimp boil bag with 1lb King Crab, 1lb Green Muscles, 1lb or Crawfish, 2 corn, 2 potatoes & sausage. We ordered it with medium spice and cajun seasoning. The seasoning was on point and the spice level was perfect! The Muscles were not on point. They were decent, but not the best. The crab was good, and the crawfish were ok as well. Nothing Mind blowing. But good.  Unfortunately, we didn't even get out of the parking lot before my stomach started rocking. I am in NO way saying it was food poisoning. But i was sick with an upset stomach (I'll leave some of the details out) for 3 days!  Maybe we will go back and get better service and try something else. They had a lot of po-boy sandwiches that looked delicious.

-TCYvBr-4GGeTUOOXqI40A.text: This is our favorite seafood boil spot. The seafood is always cooked perfect, their sauce is amazing with big chunks of garlic. Soooooo good!! Servers are really nice. This place is always busy, but they always manage to go check in our table. Great service and delicious food.

GQTyn8vcNt9QDeDEAYtZSg.text: When it comes to seafood, this is my favorite place! You won't regret the taste everything in their menus! Place is tight too! Clean and well maintained!

VgWupR8RIIMijJqdB15ELA.text: The best crawfish in town. I always bring my family and friends over to this spot. Kim is always awesome giving superb customer service. I'll definitely be back.

-cjT1HhGZiaMrNAxzmUQhQ.text: Went here for the first time and very clean inside !! The shrimp basket was awesome and they have a great selection of Food!!   Our service was awesome and she really went out of her way to make it a great experience! We had one little issue in the beginning but they overcame it fast !!   I had the Po Boy with sausage and oyster with Cajun fries and they were yummy !! Great place !!

XmTT_9RLAsTotKxg_eJJhA.text: Freakin' great!  Who would of thought you could get such great oysters on the half shell in Vegas - but you can, but you gotta get them here.  Affordable, cold, very clean, and very tasty oysters - the "weekend waitress" who was working on a Wednesday was a delight and we enjoyed her singing along to some tunes.  Highly recommend and we're considering going back before the end of our trip.

Vi2Tz0T_wSaIJPQtSSOrpg.text: Food was bland and really under seasoned. I'm from South Carolina so I do know a thing or two about a good shrimp boil. The crawfish over cooked.  The lady on the phone was rude and extremely not helpful.  In case the manager is re-viewing this review I spoke with a female on 6 September at roughly 4 thirtyish.  Not a way to speak with a guest trying to order.    Overall bad experience

I_pqqUd4gr02wLdAe4cNQw.text: Food is consistent; clams are cleaned very well, no sand particles; service is good...!

Ox-kJCFEaXrwsdcy4S-dIw.text: Split the Street size seafood boil with a friend and it was just the right amount. Had King Crab, shrimp, and crawfish with the Urban spice mix and the Medium heat. It was my first time having a seafood boil and I have to say I will be back to try more.

0UyusEZZXAm6yDxnt2nh6g.text: I honestly think this dinner made the entire trip. I'll never honestly look at seafood the same. We got the Cajun fries - crispy and perfect. We got all four sauces mixed together which we loved, plus crawfish, shrimp, king crab. Bombbbbb. Even though both of us smelled like garlic all night. Oops.

FaV8oM3z_CzNxH463Bujnw.text: This is our new crawfish place. Crawfish and alaskan king very tasty. Staff super friendly. Variety is good. Try the lobster claw game.

7-yjaOrGHKjFYMN0Zcgi8w.text: Love the spicy cajun shrimp!  Whenever I feel eating boiling crab, I'd rather go to this place instead. It's kinda the same, different name.

O7KhOf4CYcEIfEX7rpyJ4Q.text: Wayyyyy better than hot n juicy and boiling crab. The flavors of the urban mix burst in your mouth. We usually get the combos on the back of the menu rather than order a la carte. The Cajun fries are very flavorful and crispy, but the zesty waffle fries are a game changer. We get great service 90% of the time. And the owner is super nice every time we run into her.

uc0JpUda4coy6UlawQes0g.text: We just had the best seafood dining experience at this place yesterday. This place is similar to Boiling Crab and Hot and Juicy Crawfish but 10x better. We had the Street combo which you can get 3 items and it comes with 2 corn and 6 sausages for under $63.95. We had the Dungeness crab, a pound of shrimp, and a pound of mussels with the Urban Mix sauce. That is a lot of food for the price and should be enough to feed 4 people. When they brought it out, they had it in a bag which most Creole seafood restaurants do but then they pour it in a pan. I thought it was easier to pick out your food that way than digging into a plastic bag. Everything was so fresh and flavorful! We also had their fried oysters which were bigger than a chicken nugget. Twice bigger in size than what we get from Boiling crab.  Just so plump and juicy! It was only $8.99 and comes with fries.   The server that we had was so friendly and efficient. She kept checking up on us and refilling our drinks and and making sure we had enough limes for our dipping sauce. I have to have my lime, salt, and pepper   She also gave us free ice cream for dessert.   The quality of food, service, and price is much better than their competitors in my food fanatic opinion Overall experience was great and will def be back for more. They have happy hours specials too. Oyster for $1 and domestic beer for $2.

CgSCntY4AakQszV6rr4y2w.text: I don't know why this place doesn't get more love, the deals and combinations are on par with the place right across the street. *cough cough -- hot n juuuu-----**  and definitely less packed.  They have really random stuff like an array of boba, frog legs, fried etole balls.  Their customer service is great. Haven't been to hot n juicy or boiling crab since to avoid the wait!   It's super clean, and reasonably priced with a good rewards system (although I haven't gone back to redeem anything yet)   Highly recommend especially if you're caught waiting in line or in the awfully though out parking lot at H&J one day (sorry for the shade, not sorry)

2NlIe8lcuSwj6E4blVIJTA.text: Omg I wish this place Stop makes me disappointed.  First, they changed owner. So don't expect pre-owner's nice services from new owner.  I went this place at 10pm.  And I got my food at 10:40pm. There was one big table ( looks like owner's friends) and one other table. ( they came later than my table but they got food faster than us)  After that, I was about to ask a check to owner but she didn't answer at all so I decided to walk to her to get a check.  Ridiculous part is she smiled to other table and handed to them and tell thank,plz come back again. But she just threw the check to my table without saying anything Okay bye I will never come back

U7F_3q6w_hMCMnVjZbamRQ.text: Just a few things... Delicious  Scrumptious  Tasty  Yummy Flavorful Perfection  Delectable  Out of this world  Palate pleasing  Bursting with flavor  I could go on FOREVER! THE BEST I'VE EVER HAD!! HANDS DOWN!!

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Sooooo GOOD!! #2 Street Combo with King Crab Legs, Shrimp &amp; Crawfish and a side of rice! #SPICY

Q0mrKaRtVlLvFLJlYkvzKw.text: The sauce are perfect and addicting.  I don't see the need to wait for a long time at the other crawfish joints when this is just as fresh and sauce is far better.  I've had frog leg, crab, crawfish, oysters, and the last time my wife had salmon and surprisingly she said it was one of the best salmon she's had and she's actually pretty picky.  I believe the owner works there as well and you can see the care that comes when the owner is there working.  It's been consistently great. We've even order several pounds to go and take it with us on the plane back to Utah.  Do yourself a huge favor and give this little gem a try.  I know for sure in no time there's going to be a huge wait when the secret is out!

9P4j1CtmP1v-t_t6Q2_mlQ.text: Our first time trying cajun seafood in bags was across the street from Urban Crawfish at H&J. Don't get me wrong, I love H&J and when I came back home to the Midwest and tried other places like this, nothing was comparable to H&J!  I found Urban Crawfish on Yelp and it had amazing reviews for being new. So I told my husband I would bookmark it and the next time we are in Vegas, we should stop here to see what the hype is about. It was definitely comparable to H&J, but I felt the flavors that Urban Crawfish were much better! It's just something about their Urban mix that makes it delicious! It has some asian tastes to it as well, maybe that's why I like it better? I mean H&J does too and I'd go to both, but if I had to choose, I'd go with Urban Crawfish.  Their prices aren't bad either. My husband and I always share a bag because I mainly eat the shrimps, clams, and mussels. Between the two of us, it's like $40 before tip and tax.  I will also give them a 5 Star because they were short staffed and super busy one night when we went in March. We waited nearly an hour for our food and the server came to tell me there was a mishap and our food didn't get put through the system and it would take another 30 mins. I was not having that and let them know..the manager apologized and gave us 50% off our bill. Kudos for caring about your customers.

OcMHqy0LTam9ABRiDnCBKg.text: We ordered shrimp and snow crab legs 1lb each, deep fry soft shell crabs and house special fried rice. All are delicious, sauces is very tasty similar to Joe's Crab Shack in Fremont, CA. The great thing about here was no line so the customer service was great. We'll be back

jmF8VZQd_iZhCh72Ti28Bw.text: Our server was Raju and he was a pleasant server to have! He asked us if it was our first time there and then he introduced us to the menu. We ordered the Road Combo with crawfish, shrimp, and blue crab. It came with two corn and two potatoes and sausages as well for $40.95. We also ordered a dozen oysters since they were only $1 each. When the food came, Raju asked if we would like him to open the bag for us. We said yes and we are glad he offered to open the bag for us cause we would have made a mess and wouldn't have turn out good. The urban mix was delicious! I was like.....why haven't I found this place before! Everything was so good and the sauce was perfect. I asked Raju for the spice level to be in between mild and medium. This place is awesome ! I love it I love it!

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lol all gone!
Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Loooooook so good and it was delicious
Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. This is Raju our server opening the bag for us!

MA6d70-fOzVB8AOwGm7AMg.text: Always outstanding in customer service. Food keeps me coming back! Love the Mio sparkling Sake.

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Lobster Po-boy. Lobster is deep fried.

usTsf-vj1pRyFz8pGpc-hA.text: First off, let me start by saying how much I appreciate the fact that the food not only comes in a bag, but with a metal plate/bowl-like container to dump the seafood in!   The sauce was amazing, got the mild Smokin. Soooo good! So much flavor, not too oily, and the spice level was just right.  Very good customer service. I would recommend this place to anyone! Even 2 of my friends showed up in the middle of dinner to try this place out haha

bObhq7hTZpWTNsTZIqrLdg.text: This place is great! The sauce isn't watery and the owner prides themselves in consistency. We ordered 2 lb of shrimp, 1 lb king crab, chicken wing basket, and fried calamari. Best sauce was the urban mix. The owner was friendly and chatted with us for a bit. This is probably now my fav place for cajun style seafood!

RKoORcdHKaBqXINsvhyzCQ.text: Customer service was completely awesome! They were all very friendly and upbeat.   My girlfriend played the lobster machine. Those lobsters are tricky, she almost got it the first time, but she tried her luck almost wasting 20 dollars in, until she accepted her defeat. Haha. She had a blast however, and the staff was interactive as well.   It's a clean little spot, not very crowded like hot and juicy... Which is a plus!   The food was great, they give a bunch of shrimp for ordering just 1 lb. They have meal deals too, which was great, and a tv that shows all they offer.  I still prefer hot and juicy for their shrimp and mussels. However, this place is solid.

Fgj5w70PBrnJ_stRR6Oxhw.text: Very good taste on the lemon pepper and urban mix options.  However we also love the large deep fried shrimp, good old fashion fried shrimp,  house fried rice is also very good.  We prefer Urban Crawfish over hot n juicy.

sa_2VUO_nDbCZ3txpIwhtg.text: Great place!  Very friendly staff and delicious food. We got 2 lbs of crawfish with Urban sauce/medium hot and it was perfect. Highly recommend.

WdjB3MPkw5QNnxgb9Fc1aQ.text: The food here is amazing!!! Way better than Hot and Juicy and Boiling crab. Food is fresh and the place is new and clean!! I can literally eat here everyday.Prices are reasonable and service was great!! Try it out I guarantee you won't be disappointed!!! Also, we got a lobster on them My boyfriend hooked the lobster on the first try so it not impossible!! And that was delicious!!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Winner!!
Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The beautiful lobster that was won in the lobster machine to the right.
Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Combo#1 Med smokin style 2 corn sausage

4W8xWRW5SxiTQjDd7z7F_Q.text: Literally the best service we've ever gotten them at any restaurant. We came in had cocktails and beers and the best seafood ever. Kim our waitress was truly amazing and knows exactly what she's doing and get it right on the money every time. We will definitely be coming back here anytime we come to the Vegas area!!! Literally amazing!!

99FU5Tr1pITP5WAyRtggww.text: Interesting way of presenting cajun food. Food comes in a big bag and has a lot of flavors. A little bit on the salty side tho.

6Wkf_jKlxhrZX1oMRKDLeQ.text: Amazing service and food. Our server was really knowlegable on the menu especially the beer and wine. Thanks you for service and tasty food smoking crawfish

tKBrxVbWWV1WTrsMdesBJg.text: This place is DOPE/FABULOUS!!!! Our waiter was super friendly, entertaining (he danced & sang) and very attentive.  We got the crawfish which was delicious!!!! Not to mention they were on the larger size which is awesome cuz it's MORE MEAT!!!  Love the trays which helped to keep all the juices together.  Would definitely recommend this place to anyone & everyone!!!

iD0HcOEeMCnYHmCM2uIS2w.text: Great service and food was delish! The flavor is different from other places like boiling crab. Must try the house fried rice too! Yummo!

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. You catch em, they cook them lol

T5QwgV9tpVyLB3CrPdtzBg.text: So me and my wife came here to try the crawfish and it wasn't bad. We thought the seasoning could of used a little more citrus or something to brighten up the overall mix. The "mud bugs" were really fresh and were decent size, which is a plus. The service was really good also drinks were constantly topped off, and the manager or owner even came out to have conversation with us also. Overall experience was good, and I would come back again. Only reason i didn't give them 5 stars is because I lived in the south before moving to Vegas and they take crawfish seriously. So I'm kinda picky when it comes to crawfish boils or southern food.

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The aftermath!

fYP1pTaeRU6DEkxh5Uzr0Q.text: My Gf and I were craving some hot & juicy and heard this was just as good. The place was pretty good, but sadly I will continue to be a fan of the hot&juicy sauce. We both ordered the $40 package which gives you the option of 3 items from their 5 item list and you get 1lb of each.   I got the clams, mussels, and shrimpies My Gf got the crawfish, mussels  and shrimpies   We ordered fried alligator, cajun fries, and dynamite baked mussels also  ..   Everything was pretty good except I wasn't a fan of the dynamite baked mussels (the sauce was a bit bland) and it was our first time trying the alligator, but it tasted a bit "fishy"   We were huge fans of the clams and will probably come back for those !   All in all it was a different atmosphere and we will probably come back .. Depending on what we are craving.

jpczrpKYDkc3kHAwHgAmZw.text: Excellent food, flavorful and good quality. Love it, love it, love it. Friendly environment!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Delicious
Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. After the fact, sausage, corn,mussels gone!!!!!

VjOvMbH_3n-Ob3kRQ9ec4g.text: I am the biggest fan of Boiling Crab and Hot N Juicy so when I heard there's a new place in town, I had to go try it. I got the snow crab legs in the mild Smokin' Style sauce and it was better than expected! Some reviews mentioned that the sauce is not flavorful and nowhere near BC/HnJ level so I was a little worried going in. The sauce does taste a bit different than BC/HnJ and less oily but it's just as good if not better than the other two (I know, I never thought I would ever say that!). My boyfriend got the Shrimp and Crawfish Po Boy and he really enjoyed it as well.  Added bonus, there was no wait when we got there on a Saturday night around 7:30! Our waiters Nicole and Billy were super nice and constantly checked up on us to see if we needed anything.

eBImywPNzxO11aKSfvA8fw.text: I'm getting SMOKIN' DEALS! It's good deal and look's soooo good! U have to try this place

3Dy4jqkwHDRROvm9i4bBeA.text: Best Service, snow crabs was soooo good. The smokin style sauce is sweet and not too garlicky. Other Crawfish joint like Hot and Juicy put too much garlic give u a bad garlicky after taste. They don't have have the same taste for sure. Must check this place out. for sure smokin crawfish taste better. I feels like I'm at home when I eat my dinner here.

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Snow Crab legs
Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yummmme!!!!! Crawfish....

oen3dJY7vm2uApo8fZcABQ.text: This place is amazing!! My friend and I came here last minute about and hour before close and the staff was so nice the whole time not to mention the food was the best I've ever had!! The urban remix sauce is the best ,and the food came quickly !! This is definitely my new favorite spot!!

5GPOeNpCdooIg5Z1AJohcA.text: Everything was super fresh! The sauce is fantastic! I'm in love with their house special sauce. Friendly staffs. Definitely is my new spot for crawfish

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Also love the wings!
Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. The tray is such a great idea. Keep all the sauce in place

c2Zog039rPhz7jbWQWYk3Q.text: This place is great! Crab, shrimp, and crawfish are a must! Coconut drink even comes in a real coconut! Very accommodating to large groups! Will return!

pafzcCCD2vXlFvEIkyFClg.text: I am hooked to their smoking seafood.We choose for medium spicy.It really good and the young coconut juice is fresh.

8i0wdXwM3egZ8D1sRzyV6Q.text: Great food , awesome service .  Our server Billy was personable and knowledgeable .  Kumamoto and Blue point Oysters were clean fresh and delightfully smooth. Great deal . Wings and fries were on point. I will definitely  be back to try more.

lm7n7w3ArXixueCT1mvSFg.text: Found this restaurant on yelp and it was one of the best crawfish places that I've been to. Their sauce is bomb and the servers there are really nice. Would definitely come back next time me and the boyfriend are in vegas!

pX5Z13Uw-UQ9CuIy6s4fzQ.text: Awesome place awesome price!  Delicious food.  A wonderful change of scenery from the strip and not far at all.

okzv85YH8_YFISmDkFhZUQ.text: Hands down the best seafood Cajun/Creole restaurant in town. I dream about this place when I'm craving some good seafood boil. Their smokin flavor is awesome sauce. Their service is excellent and the owner is super sweet.

KmK9qH1OyXvozU4RHSMkoA.text: First time here and the place is quite empty, but we give it a try anyway. We ordered the smokin' style, and flavor was a bit sweet and light (Less salt, garlic and grease oil). Crawfish, and clams were fresh but shrimps were a bit small but still fresh. Service was awesome! I prefer lemon pepper flavor, but will give it a try next time to determine if I am a fan of this place.

e6Vay7-2bKKRG11MUDLHLw.text: The food and service here is literally amazing! Most satisfying meal I've had in a while and probably the best service I've ever received- our servers name was Billy and he was super nice and helpful! I got the shrimp with the urban sauce mix (all 4 sauces mixed together) and at a mild level, next time I'll probably get medium! The sauce was super delicious and flavorful and the shrimp were cooked perfectly. Can't wait to go back to this place!

M2nlud3KAuDauOWuGB0YhQ.text: What an amazing meal. Great fun, great taste and great service from Billy. I came with my team from work and planning to book for my entire Asia Pacific team in August. It is that good!

w__OWBqu_xM6XnzfWbC3CA.text: Picked up a wonderful po boy sandwich from here earlier. I'll definitely be back to try out some more things

k12-sSrpKu2aMta5BLT2XQ.text: The atmosphere and the ambiance was superb. The food was excellent definitely worth stopping by to try. Mika the server was personable and very knowledgeable about menu and the variety of flavors.

4M_rMYawBwKttC_-hxScLw.text: This is the best place for eating crawfish in Las Vegas. I got fresh oysters, crawfish, shrim, claims. I did not wait for too long to have a table, nice service.

4y3HiE82siD0LvRDjDJeew.text: This was an awesome accidental find! Everything is hand crafted for the tables and bar...food was great and substantial. There easily was 5lbs of food in the house sauce and served in steam bag and platter. Kevin is great and gave us a great background on the restaurant....truly a nice little gem! We will certainly stop back in. Nice happy hour with $2 beers Mon-Wed 12-4pm Check it out smokingcrawfish.com Thanks Kevin & Mika for your great service

nYRJ5jRAW6Ig8GvBA2yoQA.text: Amazing food, affordable and friendly staff!  Don't eat seafood on the strip, this is better than anything they could offer hands down!  No bullshit, AMAZING FOOD!!!!

rlaymJHTkIhb9ETpNnM3AA.text: Casian dining at its finest!  That's right...a new cuisine has been invented here..."Casian" = Cajun + Asian.  Great Cajun seafood classics prepared and served by Asians.  Whatever you want to call it, it definitely works.  This place rocks!

hQrPJCqjqgeAVwXnAmeTMQ.text: This is definitely my new crawfish joint! I'm from Louisiana so my family is really on eating crawfish. It is rare to find a place that is fresh and Smokin' Crawfish has some of the most freshest sea food I've tasted in Vegas. OH MY GOD THERE FOOD IS SOO GOOD! Their oysters & crawfish were sooo fresh and did not taste fishy like most places do! You definitely get that home-made taste. The place is really neat as well, a modern kick to it ;p The staffs were very, very friendly. They always came over to check on us and made sure our waters were always filled. Amazing custom service. Try this new tasty place! You won't regret it!

Ppk2XYh2ROqfPhXC4aSkhA.text: The sauce for the seafood was great! The staff was helpful and attentive. Only reason why they don't get 5 stars is because the frozen Crawfish that was served tasted a little old. If they had fresh Crawfish they would have knocked it out of the park.

bIH5OHjNOTdaWLRpZzA9dw.text: The smokin' style sauce is DA BOMB!!! My man and I shared the combo set with Snow Crabs, Shrimp, and Crawfish, Corn, Sausage, and Potatoes, and we were properly STUFFED. But not in a gross way. ;) The service was lovely, the ambiance was relaxed. Just know that the amount of garlic they put in their sauce will have you burping up some serious garlic for the next 24 hours. Potent. But amazing.

nLLnNKxcFKSNPuy7tboCFA.text: The best soft shell crab on Vegas. Really  good service  , need to try the lobster in smokin style . have a nice one

wWVTzPyJ6o0EgyEH37wjSA.text: This was place was awesome. I had a 1lb of crawfish, medium heat with the smoking sauce and it was delicious. The medium heat is pretty on point as far as medium but I'm definitely going to try the spicy heat next time. I also had kumamoto oysters, those were super flavorful and creamy. By far the best oysters I've had here in Las Vegas, that alone should be reason to come here because the prices compared to the hotels is by far cheaper. I also got the Cherrstone Clams, which by the way are raw and so good.  I'm going to recommend this place to all the seafood lovers. The staff made the visit even better, knowledgable and super nice.

WhXO0lClyVsUSaM4TXnYLA.text: Visiting Vegas and trying something off the strip. OMG did we hit the jack pot of seafood boil! There's even a "lobster claw" machine where you claw for a lobster and get to have what you catch on the table. Jake was our server and he was super friendly. Other servers who helped also friendly and provided great service.   Last but not least, food was amaaaazing! Definitely best crawfish I've had. Everything was fresh and juicy. If I live in Vegas this is definitely the place I'd come back to for a good seafood boil.

GYWGImLlhO9F0Rpeb3eXhg.text: Smokin style hot sauce the one up that...Awesome! House Sake is sweet.. not bitter in the end. Customer Service exceptional.

Kiefdfue_zUXMmdcR9wI4g.text: Food was great and good customer service! I will come back again and suggest this to my friends. Keep up the good and excellent customer service

wr2r-C3uu2uw0wMul7cftw.text: Smokin' Crawfish has really good food in great quality with a warm atmosphere. The crawfish is the best with fresh taste.

Hk0-PlbXZ-958LW21IMtsw.text: Great service. Great food.  The amount you receive is definitely worth the price. My new go to place, Kevin is an amazing waiter.

Ept3iI6RPV-c4viDqGaflA.text: Our first time here was great the food is very tasty and the service is very good. They have a lot of options and things I haven't seen any where else like gator meat and frog legs if you like that kind of stuff definitely recommend this place the atmosphere is real cool and relaxed as well.

5OAonUG6NcF6Gqg-9P5_lQ.text: I came in with my girls, first time here. The place was clean and a very nice atmosphere!! Mika was our server and she was fantastic!! She was attentive without making us feel rushed! I don't like spicy and she was very helpful getting my food spice level right!! I will definitely be coming back!!!

i1atnWmCmzkl0B3SDqt_3w.text: A friend and I came in for lunch. Our server Mika was very nice and attentive. Great atmosphere and food!

dTXpoO5oUpq9PV0GXUAfhQ.text: We ordered a pound of snow crab and 1 pound of shrimp to share. We ordered sausage and cajun fries as well. The cajun fries were just okay for me because they weren't really spicy and they are the big huge fries that get soft after awhile. Anyways everything else we ordered was delicious. Service was every attentive and friendly. Will be coming again!

bjh4AtCMKi2yMyghIWoL0A.text: I was very disappointed that they wouldn't accept my coupon from the money mailer because I printed it in black and white. That was the only reason I decided to dine there. If they are going to be that petty, I will take my business to hot and juicy.

wJgQsR-X06nKASK0m4sIfA.text: After looking at local Yelp reviews, I decided to try this place out for myself. And let me say: this was definitely a great decision. First and foremost, the restaurant is amazing clean and modern: something you don't see from a "boiling-crab" type of joint. Secondly, the waitress/owner was extremely knowledgable and friendly. And lastly, the food was DELICIOUS! Their "urban mix" sauce is very savory and flavorful: I tried it on the wings and seafood. Definitely give this place a shot. You won't be disappointed!

FqZJ5XM5SQRrShA1CSPu6Q.text: This place is fantastic. The food is great and good service. Most flavorful boil I've ever had. The price is according to market and affordable. My server Nichole was extremely friendly and helpful.

IcX7F6UM7FDtF2nf_1LwBA.text: The food was good. Kind of bummed they didnt have garlic noodles. The waitress was really nice and attentive. The shrimp by the pound didn't look like a pound to me, but I guess I just wanted more? lol   We also ordered oysters for $1 each since it was happy hour. The oysters were small.  The spicy is not that spicy, if I go back i will get the hottest.  Also didn't really like their corn it tasted funny to me.  There is a stench when you walk to the restrooms, I think its the lobster machine.  If you can catch a lobster for $2, they will cook it for you. I do not recommend doing that... the lobsters look old and thats probably why it stinks so bad around there.

JXs5gmJZYlntr7XwBnAsAA.text: Yum! Yum! Yum! First timer here and they didn't fail! The staff were very helpful and was ready to answer our questions! They even recommend the level of spice! The food was fresh and really tasty! Delicious fresh seafood! We will be back!

w1YjScKhbMhHdWN7o9JJFg.text: Great food and service here, like the crawfish so much! Never miss the delicious food here!

mkFHID0SXhBXdgYHlzXuEg.text: I just went with my wife for lunch today at this wonderful place. The smoking hot sauce is awesome. It's the best we've ever had in town for crawfish. The service is amazing and I tried the raw oysters which are amazing by the way. The place inside is very inviting and cozy. This is going to be our hangout place with my wife every weekend.

p1dWnl23covU3B6FTkHHEA.text: Are you kidding me about these good reviews??  I tried so many restaurants during 20 years of visiting Las Vegas from California, This place is the worst one so far.  My family went there on Christmas eve around 6:00pm. She told us that we have to wait about an hour. when we finally sat down at the table( right next to dirty restroom)  and ordered some foods. I realized, why there was an hour wait time even  there wasn't much customers waiting  in the place. They didn't know how to operate the restaurant at all.  We ordered seafood combo #2 with medium spice, house fried rice, alligator fries, steam corn, steam rice. It took forever to receive the foods and They totally forgot our rice and corn, never brought them until we finished all the  foods. When I remind her for them, she said I have to wait another 15min for steam corns.  The  seafood combo was lack of flavor.  House fried rice was too salty and fried alligator was choppy little pieces of trash.( worst out of three ) I was really upset about their poor service and their food quality. I just cannot believe why this place received these good reviews. Did they paid people to write good reviews?  When I complained about the service, she gave me the discount but I rather pay full price with  good service and good quality of food. I wasted my valuable holiday time and money with my family at the terrible restaurant.

Q26FluVbJXHSa9uLWZbZLQ.text: It's my first time here since they changed their name from Smokin Crawfish to Urban Crawfish and I am disappointed. I got the urban combo like always and the portions were half what they were before! I also got a dozen oysters and they weren't fresh at all. Don't know if I'll be back.

Fu68eE-wzIjNsho1v0nhnA.text: Service was just as good as the food! Kim and Raju who was our servers was super friendly and knowledgeable of the menu. Definitely recommend the shared meals!

U7uhdneDlzbkDxrsQUgn4g.text: Went for the happy hour beers and oysters on Aug. 2. Be prepared to sign in to Yelp in order to order off the happy hour menu; not mentioned on the internet or on their flyer. The bluepoint oysters did not disappoint and the beers were refreshing. Had a generous plate of onion rings and a bowl of tasty etouffe.  One online review showed gumbo, but it wasn't on the menu.

6OsusmrEVrxUqaTqxeIxxQ.text: Came here for dinner with friends and I'll start off by saying this place is awesome! Great food and excellent staff!  Everything we ordered was delicious, we had the lobster, crab legs, mussels and corn. All of us enjoyed the food and will definitely be back. Highly recommended for seafood lovers

DYB2XrQUTPGZDGNYHzcsNg.text: Tried this place out and now going to be my new spot , great food and great service with a friendly staff, Phil is the man and will take care of you! Also very friendly Owner!  And to make it even better they have Happy Hour for a 15% discount!!

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Came home and check out out beautiful delicious platter !!

hFW9J-YMXDVpAxIJ0B-PlQ.text: I decided to take my parents to let them try some creole food while visiting Las Vegas. Previously I used to go to Hot'n'Jucy place right across the road but this time I realized that there was a new restaurant opened. I immediately decided to try it out.  This was the right decision. Very modern and cozy restaurant with absolutely amazing food and friendly staff. Loan, one of the owners, helped us with our choices. She perfectly explained differences between different styles of their sauces for seafood.   My parents and I loved the place. Next time I travel to Vegas, the Smokincfawfish will be in my visit list.   The restaurant only 5 weeks old and they are doing great job already. I wish them to stay like that in future and to continue being innovative and creative.

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Smokin deal

iTjE7sNoKvGhWpTCNlNziA.text: Phil was extremely welcoming and helpful with the menu and suggesting his favorite items. The atmosphere is really nice and clean and the prices are very comparable to the competition. They have a huge variety of seafood and weren't out of anything which is rare for seafood restaurants in the area. I'm excited to try all of the items.

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States

6C_tIaf9kzA4K-loYmOw_g.text: ordered here for takeout so my review is based solely on their food. although the girl and guy I spoke with we're very friendly so I will more than likely be back to dine in. Sooner than later I hope!    I ended up ordering the smoking style combo with crawfish, clams, and shrimp as well as 2 corns, 2 potatoes, and 6 sausages. Sauce was amazing; if I'm not mistaken I got (according to my server) the combination of sauces aka the most popular and, man, was it delicious! Plus,No lingering garlic smell ! (hate that from other seafood houses) so, yay!! lol seafood was cooked perfectly and god the potatoes and corn!!! but really what made it all come together was the sauce!   hurry and try out this new place! I loved it !! I mean I'm a 90-100lb little thing and I devoured all 3lbs of it's contents hahaha so you could say I enjoyed myself. lol

6TCHvqDu3xpyYM936xNjfA.text: We just find new crawfish place. Super clean and stuffs Sherry & Loan are very friendly.  Garlic butter and Cajun is awesome!  I will to try again Smokin style next time. :)

x8ri8fffb-wNLxnmA6-ekg.text: If you are craving for delicious seafood, this is the place! You will never be disappointed. Sauce alone is worth coming back! Owners are super awesome too! Come and leave happy!

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Yummy!!!
Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Best seafood combo we ever had!
Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Fried rice to die for!

ggE3KYUkwhjI1-82HwCc6A.text: This place is legit. If you're in Vegas and looking for Quality Crawfish, this is the spot. It's not greasy or too garlicky. The flavor is great and the beer is only a couple bucks.

I-pid77ZF47sK4rekxvPIg.text: We found Smokin' Crawfish tucked away in the strip mall beside a Laundromat and the Asian  Supermarket.  The restaurant faces Spring Mountain Road and is right behind the Chevron gas station on the corner of Decatur Blvd and Spring Mountain Road.  We ordered  - the Alligator Bites - quite tasty! - the Etouffe - quite good! - the Catfish & Cajun Fries - yummy and fresh! -2 lbs of shrimp in Medium Smokin' Sauce - I find the sauce is thinner than Hot N Juicy and The Boiling Crab but still quite garlicky. The shrimp is so fresh and tasty.  They deliver the shrimps & sauce in the plastic bag on a metal round tray.   - 1 lb of shrimp in Mild Garlic Butter sauce - Ditto - 2 bowls of rice to sop up the delicious sauce  2 Thumbs up!

8NCbhLH3NxhO5uyd_7x4RQ.text: The crawfish deserves 5 stars.  But the restaurant gets downgraded to 2 stars for the following reasons:  1.  They don't serve beignets.  Big demerit.  2.  They only have tobacco or Sriracha sauce.   3.  The waitress has an awful bedside manner.   She is not friendly and it almost feels like she resents her customers.  Best way to describe her demeanor is curt and snappy.  She really should quit her job and find another profession more suited to her less-than-charming personality.

acgDwvi5Oml-aVC9dcLe-A.text: This place has been so far the best crawfish place I've ever tried. I've been to many different places in the U.S. and no one has made better crawfish than this one. The sauce is very good, not too salty and very spicy. We came to LV on Saturday night and decided to give them a try since they opened late till 12 am while other places closed at 11. More than expected, the food was extraordinarily good. The live oyster was super fresh, the sauce came with it was amazing. The shrimp was the best part, they made sure it wasn't overcooked, it was just right. The crawfish was very fresh as well and it could get VERY spicy. We came back the day after that. The owner was very sweet too!  P/S. Their price is very reasonable compared to other crawfish places in LV ($7.99/lbs of crawfish vs. $11.99/lbs at Hot and Juicy)

K4yQbZnkwAwx95vwhvOrfQ.text: We normally eat at Hot n Juicy but decided to try Smokin' Crab. Glad we did!  The flavors are definitely different and the bags seem to be more full of the add ins.  The flavors aren't as overpowering either, you can really taste the seafood not just spice.  Our waitress Nichole was on point too.

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. First time trying these

LwFchl7tpwhaG-Z0jPOwwA.text: FOOD: we ordered some crawfish boil with corn and potatoes to share and it was so amazing! The crawfish was 7.99 per lb and tasted very fresh. they also have special combos on the back of the menu if you would like to mix the seafood. We picked the smokin sauce which the owner explained is a bit of everything and it did not disappoint! Medium spicy was more than enough for us so think carefully before you order anything spicier.   PLACE: looks really new and well decorated. We had one of the booths by the window and it wasn't too busy on a Saturday mid-afternoon. They also have long tables for big groups. Bathrooms were clean.  PEOPLE: everyone was very friendly and the owner took the time to chat with us after we told her it was our first time trying crawfish (they don't have them in Canada). she also taught us how to eat them haha, I can see this place with lines out the door next time we are in vegas.

cBBfCFmnV5E8l20XxFEgAg.text: I so love this place. My friend brought me here and I was in heaven! I love seafoods and this is the only seafood restaurant that is not busy which is very advantage on my part since I don't have to wait too long for the server to get my order. Anyway, price is okay and I love their sweet potato fries. Place is also clean.

FP8Sbaqc1v2kcHmRoMP6_Q.text: First time trying out this place and it is definitely worth the hype! The food was very tasty and flavorful, and the servers were great. Recommend to everyone !

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Smokin style!

T0XMo9ln9Zxci2v-tLUtew.text: So I've been to crab corner, boiling crab, and hot n juicy. This place is far most the best!   I came to eat here with my boss and saw the reviews on yelp. We decided to try it out and we weren't disappointed! Best oysters and raw clams for a very good price. We also love their happy hour!

PF-aTqcUCAkeJQM80XIB3Q.text: The crawfish were really good. They have the Urban sauce which was really good. They server was really nice and out going. Good place to go eat.

zQOya8FOIyygJk4xEjnU_g.text: WOW! This is my new favorite crawfish place. Not only that the place is clean, hip and people are super friendly. The food is absolutely delicious. Must tries - king crab leg combo (with shrimp, clams and crawfish) in smokin' sauce, soft shelf crab basket, catfish po boy sandwich, fresh oysters and fried oysters and their delicious sweet tea. Yes we order all that tonight. We were so stuffed but still want to order more. I'll definitely be back again very soon.

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. King crab leg combo with shrimp, clams, crawfish, corn, potatoes and sausage.

U_BFEohS6uiPH1Sr_6MaeQ.text: Excellent first time meal there tonight. We got there about 4:30 so happy hour was still in. The place was sparsely attended but that's what we wanted. We got good attention from the waiter/trainee, management and the cooks.   Got 6 perfect oysters on ice at $1.00 each for an appetizer. Domestic beer was $2.00. We had no idea how good the oysters would be. They were fresh, sweet, not a hint of fishy and absolutely delicious. I am not a fan of raw oysters but I ate 4 of them and actually enjoyed chewing them. Heretofore I have only made a pretense of chewing and simply swallowed. These were really that good!  My husband had the catfish basket and I had the oyster basket. The catfish was in filets and man, were they good. The oysters were the best I have eaten anywhere, bar none. I can put down some oysters if they are fried. These were perfect! I am gluten sensitive and had no repercussions from eating the breading which leads me to think it is mostly, if not all, cornmeal, with very little flour. Heads-up IBS sufferers! I would have ordered 6 more fried oysters but they were out. So we got 6 more raw oysters.  The baskets were served with cajun fries, which we had, or we could have had sweet potato or waffle fries for a small up-charge. The fries were so good, crispy outside, hot hot hot inside with a nice cajun seasoning sprinkled over. We brought the leftover fries home, that's all that was left on our table.  Condiments were all fresh and cold in separate lidded containers, even the mixture of salt and pepper. I am very leary of not-perfectly-fresh tartar sauce after an acute attack of food poisoning from eating it years ago. I had no qualms about any of these sauces.  Will we go back! YES! Will we recommend it to friends, YES! Great food, good prices! What is not to like? Next time we're trying the seafood boils with friends.

AuH_eiuqhaK-mLfg2De82w.text: Came here late on a Monday night with my Friend. We wanted to get boiling crab but it was already closed so we gave this place a shot. The ambience is just like boiling crab. It even smelled good. What is cool about this place is that they have a lobster claw machine, where if you were able to grab it, you could win the lobster and they would cook it for free.   I wanted to order half a pound of shrimp with a side of rice and French fries. I usually do half a pound of shrimp because I can't finish a pound of shrimp when eating with rice. When I got my order she gave me a pound of shrimp. This got me very confused because I ordered only half. Then she told me that they don't sell half a pound and only by the pound. The server never told me that. And I asked her if I could return the rice then. Thankfully the manager was very nice about it and said the rice would be free. And apologized about the confusion. The sauce is okay, they don't give enough. I had to ask for more sauce. The sauce costed extra but didn't charge me because of the whole shrimp confusion.   After my whole experience, I realized I still like boiling crab better. The employees are nice but the food is mediocre.

rb5AAwJ97PUtC9yQ_KbqIw.text: I would not recommend the crawfish here.  They were bland and tasted old. I thought I was getting fresh crawfish since that was in the menu board and I thought I ordered fresh,  but when I got them - they tasted previously frozen.  I'm not usually picky with frozen crawfish but there was a noticeable difference.  Also,  they are very over priced since a pond of crawfish (previously frozen) is only around $3. The best thing I had here was the boba tea- right on point...

APf5TeT58fGwgfWF7_7SUQ.text: My favorite restaurant in town! I love the shrimp with the urban mix, the fries with a side of the garlic butter is to die for and you have to try their sake bombs!

E74IxJ3Q5QGbLXq81uQ4SQ.text: I grew up with Boiling Crab being from the Bay and I was introduced to Hot n Juicy when I moved to Vegas. I've been hooked with HNJ and is my go to place for crawfish. No doubt that neither one of them is bad or better than the other, they have their own flair or twist and everyone is entitled to their own opinion.  My first time experience here was awesome. My BF and I were very impressed with the ambiance and food. Our server tonight was Billy. (Whuddup Big Pimpin'!!! Haha) He's a very cool dude. The food... Let's begin. Haha  Taste wise different and good. I liked how I'm able to get lobster in a combo meal! I think that was the plus for this place that they had choices for combos but now they all do it... haha. It's a little bit cheaper than HNJ so that's worth it too. The place is roomy and bathroom was clean (it grosses me out when places I eat at have dirty bathrooms)

JHEQBPZKL6_UkoFHRFTrBg.text: This is one of my favorite spots in Vegas! The seafood is always on point fresh, and full of flavor. If I could I would eat here on a regular basis. They give excellent service and I always enjoy my food. Keep up the excellent cooking!

FKR2ugpoTSJO446wvpUm5g.text: Spoke to a couple that swore by this place. We walked in and were immediately spoken rudely to by the nasty young lady that"greeted" us. I was hoping to find an alternative to the place across the street but I'll happily pay a little extra $ just for a little courtesy.

Df4kzJA57MoB54ppz8-XNQ.text: My first time and definitely will not be my last time here! The food was delicious! I love the atmosphere! Great music! It was a perfect place for my husband and I to spend our date night. We started off with cajun calamari. Yum! We shared one of the combo meals, which was more than enough. We left with leftovers too. Our bellies were full and satisfied. We ate snow crab legs, shrimp, crawfish, sausage, corn and potatoes. We chose the urban mix mild. It had a nice kick. I had a side of hot mix on the side. It snuck up on me quick. Delicious but, I'm sticking with the mild. The staff was great! Kim took care of us! Excellent service! Definitely a place to check out!

kU4qQBPKbzu_TEUDjBGvSg.text: Was very good! Staff was attentive and courteous! Although I did notice a look of dismay when we chose only water! We still spent $120! The crawfish were very small though. Smallest I've ever had! All the other seafood was splendid by portion and taste!

3WivMQhRXiIiliVz3iscoA.text: YUM! I was in the mood for some Cajun/Creole food and i decided to try Urban Crawfish Station. The restaurant surprisingly wasn't busy for a Saturday night. Our server (Taelor, I believe) took great care of us as it was our first time here. We got battered elote corn bites, a basket of coconut shrimp and Cajun fries, and a pound and a half of Shrimp with urban mix and mild seasoning. Everything was delicious in under $40. I'll definitely be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States

g3yIjT1R7fK911jhENqKQg.text: Great seafood. We are from New Orleans and this is the closest thing to home. Very friendly atmosphere, clean restrooms, and establishment overall.

VWcXESjqdSUdYKKdC0XjMA.text: Another Vegas spot I had bookmarked, maaaaaan I love this place, so good! This will be one of my regular spots when I come to Vegas from now on.  There's no crazy waiting time, the food is really good, and the service was awesome. It's located in like a strip mall with a bunch of other places. I haven't wasted my time on The Boiling Crab in some years, I honestly feel it's not worth it, try other places like it, they're just as good but this place is great! I ordered a shrimp and crawfish po' boy, added some of their sauce that they use on the crab/shrimp by the pound, it heightened the flavor of that po' boy up so much, so freaking good, you gotta try it!

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Shrimp and crawfish Po boy
Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States

bMmX0oy3YxF5xfMCtnBj4g.text: Such a great crawfish restaurant. Try the oysters too, they're phenomenal! We ordered the combo with the lobster mixed with the Cajun sauces, no regrets! Except for the food coma shortly after...  Billy was one of the best servers we had, great guy to joke and chat with. Looking forward to coming back!

Q1_8e-No01ZiA-dz8hUjTg.text: This place is truly amazing!! I went last night with my sister and we had the coconut shrimp and one of the seafood combos. Our combo came with Crabs, Mussels, Shrimp, Corn, Potatoes and Sausage... One word. FLAVOR!!!  We flavored our combo medium spicy with a mixture of all 4 of their signature flavors ( Garlic Butter + Louisiana + Lemon Pepper +Cajun ). This created the most savory flavor, which I ended up getting some steamed rice to enjoy the broth with.  The food was fresh, jumbo and quality. The price point is very fair, nothing is overly priced. The restaurant has a nice aura as well, everyone was so friendly and my waiter was a sweet heart. I am definitely going to recommend this place to ALL my friends who visit Las Vegas!

pqu8RRLU26i5S917xbx0FA.text: Amazing!!!!!!!! Love coming here!!!! Great options for all! Great oysters! Come here 2x a month and can't wait to come back soon!!!! A must go to!

Hl7V2cPJZa6sehwzJ9_r9A.text: This has been my go to place for Crawfish even when they were called Smokin Crawfish prior to the name change. Same delicious mouth watering seafood boils and fresh oysters! I always work at night but when I have  the day time off I always stop by for the Happy Hour. Just checkin and you can get oysters for 1$! (Yes, you read that right.) The owner is so nice and friendly and they have generous seating arrangements so bring friends!!

XiDAyCm1oFLqpN8WNxs9nQ.text: No need for a long paragraph ( inside joke with the waiter) FOOD WAS AMAZING! Taste so good. If you like seafood you have to make it a trip to come eat here!!!!!! 5 Stars for me.

LxRoQMOmHlbdoSLn4muQyA.text: Stopped at this place passing through to Utah. This place blew my mind!!! The service was beyond great and the food was even better. The prices were reasonable especially for the amount of food they give you. The crawfish we had were "bigger" than the other places I have been to. I HIGHLY recommend this place!!! I wish I lived in Vegas to have this gem in my hometown.

i1a6lDEHUPmAWSs4qjt4sg.text: I have LOVED the same crawfish restaurant for years and years and have failed to find another place that could compete...until now that is.  Eating here was like having a religious experience. Yes, the food was that good. I ordered crawfish with the urban mix @ medium spicy with the smoking fire sauce on the side. The sauce was so flavorful and amazing; I don't even know how to describe it in words. It's something you must experience for yourself. Warning: be prepared for a euphoric moment as you taste this sauce for the first time....and the second time....and every single time after that.  Continuing on, I prefer when the sauce is thick and not extremely liquid-y, so I was very satisfied with the consistency here. The smoking fire sauce I got on the side had ghost peppers in it. I was sweating but it was so flavorful, I couldn't stop dunking my crawfish in it. I regret nothing.  The Cajun fries we ordered were also amazing. I can honestly say it was the best fries I've had at any crawfish place. Each fry was perfectly crispy and light on the inside. Also, another amazing thing about this place: the service. The servers were so great and they gave us free rainbow sherbet ice cream, yet another amazing thing about this place. I'm coming back either today or tomorrow. MY NEW NUMBER ONE CRAWFISH SPOT!  P.S. Please, never change   P.P.S. I'm serious. Don't change, okay?

UEzyG7okL3N20tbl6v7DkQ.text: Love coming to place during happy hour and getting oysters.  We come in enough that the owner knows my son always wants them on the halfshell.  House sauce is what we always go with.  Very tasty.  Didn't really like the elote fritters.  Too much bread for me but soft shell crab basket is good.  Sweet potatoes fries are on point.  Live crawfish depends on whether they are in season or not.  I prefer the Louisiana over the Sacramento ones.  Service is good.  Love coming here.   Not sure why hot & juicy felt threatened enough to mess with this small biz and make them change their name.  There must be a reason!  Maybe because their food is that good!!

GTPyHxK5j7GcZ2SGf9xR9w.text: Garlic Dungeness Crab with shrimp and craw fish special was delicious! The baked oysters and mussels were a bit much with the sauce they use, kind of tastes like a mayo mix with something, but overall thumbs up! Definitely will be come back for more!

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Garlic Dungeness Crab, shrimp, and crawfish!! Bomb.com

r7EdtLPRZQxzZC2fGL1_oQ.text: Great food, great service.  I will definitely be back.  I over ordered because everything looked so good and tried a bit of everything. I'm glad I did.  It was a spectacular meal. I really appreciated having a great meal off the strip for the price of an average meal on the strip.   Billy was friendly and gave a lot of advice on some of the best things on the menu. Plus kept the restaurant entertained.  He made this place.  Keep up the great work.

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States

oBTZrFfGq7CAXIjVhfZK4Q.text: Get ready to use your hands and chow down. The seafood is fresh. Only thing I wouldn't order is mussels because they are frozen. I like everything swimming in the tanks.   Flavor was yummy. Preferred flavor is the butter and garlic. Lobster was actually really fresh too.

HK0Gt10cv01RnDftiaBz1g.text: Kim made this experience great. She remembered our whole order without writing it down and not only that she let me taste the boba before putting it in my smoothie to make sure I liked it. This is our new favorite seafood spot! Check out our video for our experience youtu.be/YFt7OViA4zY

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States
Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Strawberry boba smoothie
Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States

avkjSBLczLaqq2OY9s_OxA.text: As usual! This place is bomb! Omg! I cannot tell you how happy I am to be back in Vegas. My family just came to visit recently and of course we always come here every single day! Lol it's so worth it I usually get 6lbs of crawfish, urban mix, and spicy. With extra corn. Sausages. And potatoes. We came in afternoon on Tuesday too for happy hour oyster, and the oyster was so bomb I ordered 2 dozen! The owner is so nice and everyone there is always so friendly. I love coming here. I always forget to ask for owners name  but I'll see her again soon!

hXncyrV7rOqZ8f4cVgaL0g.text: I'm not a fan.... sorry!  The sauce just doesn't do it for me. It's kind of watery and doesn't have much flavor. The seafood also seems to be of not that great quality.. Everything was small and kind of mushy. I think the shrimp was $13.50 a pound but we got the combo special that gets you 3 pounds of seafood with potatoes and sausage for under $45.  I also thought the service was lacking. Whenever I place a takeout order at Boiling Crab or H&J, they are super on it and make sure to pack everything for you and ask if you need anything else.  It seemed like I was asking for too much when I asked for a table cover and extra lemons here.   HOT TIP: this place seems to be open on major holidays so if you need a seafood spot to grub at, here ya go!

Nrlvt-VOs6vuEwxIwsogzQ.text: So we came here on opening  day and many days after but today had such horrible service..made me consider going back to the competition..not sure if under new management but service standards  seem much  lower. Gave three  stars  due to the past experiences but based off this experience  would be a one

wVnepfgJSjDg9WrLMv9HGg.text: Urban Crawfish... one of my favorite restaurants in Vegas. The seafood has always been fresh and the customer service has been prompt and friendly. During my last visit we came in on a Friday afternoon and there was only two other tables being occupied. As an appetizer I ordered Cajun fries, they came out quickly and were fresh out of the fryer. They were hot but sooo delicious! I also ordered "The Street" with lobster, shrimp and mussels. The lobster and shrimp were cooked perfectly but the sauce (Urban Mix Medium)wasn't my all time favorite. The potatoes, corn and sausages were all tasty. Overall a delicious meal with a friendly server.

photos.caption: Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Corner View
Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States. Menu 2019
Photo of Urban Crawfish Station - Las Vegas, NV, United States

zMHwPTkKIagmHWU68xVyEg.text: I wanted live crawfish before the we head out to watch Absinthe at Caesars Palace.  Since Urban Crawfish is rated high on yelp and there is a wait at Hot n Juicy, we decided to give Urban Crawfish a try.  Unfortunately, they did not have live crawfish (in another month or so).  - Crawfish Etoufee - added crawfish tails and definitely taste frozen.  Flavor of the etoufee was good. - Fried Soft Shell Crabs - frozen so after a bite, though the batter was nice a crispy, there was way too much water that came out of the soft shell crabs. - Oyster po boy - the baguette itself was quite delicious.  Was soft but strong enough to hold shreds of iceberg lettuce, slices of tomatoes, and hefty amount of fried oysters.  I enjoyed it very much and when I want oyster poboy, I will get it here. - cajun fries - piping hot and crispy on the outside.   Service was great, and yes, the restroom is very clean.  I will be back for the live crawfish.

SRK-lfRyush7GzuYeBLyjg.text: With a handful of really good places in Vegas to choose from.  This is a new one with great flavors.  The oysters, shrimp and fried rice were perfect.    It nice to have a new tasty place to choose from with good prices too.

4nTdDjqQ203vdE1bTmaG8A.text: We came in this afternoon for a late lunch. We were not that hungry so we only ordered two items. We got the market price snow crabs and the hh oysters. The oysters were fresh and delicious since it was hh they were $1. We got the option of the urban sauce which is a combo of all 4 options (butter, lemon pepper, Cajun and Louisiana) or dressing for the crab and it was pretty good. We got the side of the spicy sauce and that was a perfect kick. The service was good. Our server was attentive and had good recommendations. Overall a good experience. I'll definitely be back to try other things on the menu.

-oIMaj6oKZeob25eQApGEQ.text: Came here on our last day in Vegas. Their crawfish is very flavorful and saucy! They had happy hour oysters for $1 per oysters ... not sure if it is during certain time but it was definitely on Thursday .   Nice owner! Definitely come by and check them out

_Uy3Ljln8XbRugyC7lr7UA.text: Went in for the first time yesterday, the food tasted amazing and reasonably priced for the amount. We got the street #1 with the urban sauce and it was the perfect serving size for two adults. I can't wait to go back and try the other menu items they have to offer! The only reason they're getting four stars instead of five is due to the seating situation when we first came in, the hostess did not seem too attentive and just kind of waived us in the direction of where we were supposed to sit, other than that we had a great experience.

ja5xeY9FHaOpS1bqBWH94Q.text: I've NEVER been so disappointed in a restaurant.  Let me begin with this, customer service is EVERYTHING. If you're going to have a customer wait 40 minutes before serving the first order and another 25 for the rest of food, you could at least apologize for the wait.   I came in here and waited to be seated. Nobody greeted us so I went to the bar and asked for a seat. The waitress points at an empty table. We sat down and waited a few minutes before the same waitress came to take our drink orders.   We came here 1.5 hours before closing. The place isn't packed, it was a Wednesday night.   I really wanted some Cajun while I was in Vegas but this place ruined my last night here.   I did get up to complain, it's ridiculous of a wait.  Our waitress who was NO WHERE to be found. One of the waiters helped me out and he went back to check on the chef.  At no time did our waitress ever apologize to us or check to see if we needed anything.   All due respect, I don't even know what you pay her for.

TAhto8DREags0TMPdN2veA.text: First impressions are important and after one visit to Urban Crawfish Station...I'm a fan..  Urban Service:  7 PM Birthday dinner..party of 20 please. Our lead server was phenomenal with getting the orders correct, keeping the drinks fresh and the table cleared.  The kitchen was good with getting our huge variety of orders out timely and didn't miss anything.  At the end we asked for one bill, then everyone changed their mind and wanted separate bills. smh..lol but our server didn't flinch and took care of everything, excellent.  Urban Shrimp: I went with the 1 lb market price shrimp which was $12 that evening.  I went with the Urban Mix sauce: Garlic butter, lemon pepper, cajun and Lousiana style with a spice level of 'spicy'  I threw some corn (tracer rounds) in there with a side of rice and this was a treat.  Shrimp was perfect as was the sauce.  I sampled everyone's dishes as well and the calamari was solid and a great appetizer.  Urban Ambiance:  Casual seafood restaurant decor with wooden tables and benches everywhere for the messy eating.  There's a bar for single eaters like myself on many nights.   This might be my new go to place when I'm fiending crawfish and shrimp.  The service and the food is excellent for what you pay for and I was surprised there wasn't a wait this visit.  We'll hit up the crawfish next visit but that's another Yelp tale.  Enjoy!

88zNCykCIa0AXYYsYDncRw.text: Had a very rude African American waitress take care of us the last time I was there.  She was loud & rather obnoxious. She should write things down because she got our boil order wrong. I didn't complain because with her attitude I think she would mess up(do something) with our order if we did. They need to do something with this waitress. Too abrasive for customer service.

5RPw8EiI-NkbBaVDNuOBbQ.text: This used to be my favorite place in Vegas for crawfish but,  the last time my husband and I went the shrimp were soggy and mushy.

9p4vXU_3Pa-E__tMKPiOdQ.text: The place is nice and clean. Our food was delicious. The waitress took our order right away and our food  was served piping hot. I will be back.
